file_insights.purpose: Reusable wrapper component for custom interactive elements with WCAG 2.1 AAA compliance

patterns_discovered.name: Accessibility-First Component Design
patterns_discovered.description: Component implements WCAG 2.1 Level AAA compliance with minimum 44x44px touch targets, with support for larger variants (48px, 56px)

patterns_discovered.name: Styled Components with Forward Props Configuration
patterns_discovered.description: Uses MUI's styled() with shouldForwardProp configuration to filter custom props (size, centered, inline, showFocusRing) from DOM

patterns_discovered.name: Focus Management for Keyboard Navigation
patterns_discovered.description: Implements focus-visible styles with 2px primary color outline and 2px offset for keyboard users, toggleable via showFocusRing prop

patterns_discovered.name: Touch Interaction Optimization
patterns_discovered.description: Disables double-tap zoom with 'manipulation' touchAction and removes iOS tap highlight via WebkitTapHighlightColor

patterns_discovered.name: Semantic Component Variants
patterns_discovered.description: Provides specialized TouchTargetLink and TouchTargetButton components that render as proper HTML elements (<a> and <button>)

patterns_discovered.name: Flexible Centering and Layout
patterns_discovered.description: Offers configurable centered, inline, and display properties to accommodate various use cases (icons in text, standalone buttons, etc.)

patterns_discovered.name: Active State Feedback
patterns_discovered.description: Implements scale(0.98) transform on :active pseudo-class for tactile feedback on interaction

patterns_discovered.name: Disabled State Handling
patterns_discovered.description: Supports both aria-disabled and :disabled selectors with opacity reduction and pointer-events: none

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: Type casting required for component refs
gotchas_discovered.description: TouchTargetLink and TouchTargetButton require 'ref as any' type casting when passing to TouchTarget component, indicating potential type system gap

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: Default role='button' may conflict with semantic elements
gotchas_discovered.description: TouchTarget defaults to role='button' which is redundant for TouchTargetButton (renders as <button>) and may cause accessibility issues if not overridden

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: Touch action and tap highlight not universally supported
gotchas_discovered.description: touchAction: 'manipulation' and WebkitTapHighlightColor are browser-specific optimizations that may not affect all devices

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully created a comprehensive TouchTarget wrapper component that provides WCAG 2.1 AAA compliant touch targets with flexible sizing, accessibility features, and semantic variants
achievements: Implemented three-tier sizing system (44px min, 48px comfortable, 56px large)
Added keyboard navigation support with focus-visible styling
Created specialized semantic variants for links and buttons
Optimized for touch interactions across platforms
Provided extensive JSDoc documentation with usage examples
challenges_overcome: Managing custom props in MUI styled components via shouldForwardProp filter

recommendations.suggestion: Consider creating a generic ref type utility to eliminate 'ref as any' type casting in TouchTargetLink and TouchTargetButton
Explicitly override role prop in TouchTargetButton and TouchTargetLink components to prevent role conflicts with semantic elements
Add example usage for disabled states and aria-disabled attribute in component JSDoc
Create unit tests covering: touch target sizing verification, keyboard navigation, focus visibility, and disabled states across semantic variants
Add fallback styles for browsers that don't support focus-visible pseudo-class
